rows.label: qst500801_msg0001
rows.name:
Rex very much changed since me
see Rex last time.

rows.label: qst500801_msg0002
rows.name:
Even have Nopon Driver friend now!
Nopon Driver quite rare.

rows.label: qst500801_msg0003
rows.name:
Me tell you little story of amazing
Nopon Driver, name of Noporikh.

rows.label: qst500801_msg0004
rows.name:
As me just say, Driver Nopon
quite rare breed.

rows.label: qst500801_msg0005
rows.name:
But Noporikh not just Driver.
First and foremost, was great salvager!

rows.label: qst500801_msg0006
rows.name:
Much like Rex both Driver and
salvager now.

rows.label: qst500801_msg0007
rows.name:
Noporikh use power of Blade to
defeat many monster that attack
while salvaging.

rows.label: qst500801_msg0008
rows.name:
Such amazing work, was known for
time as Legend Salvager.

rows.label: qst500801_msg0009
rows.name: But life not always go same as plan.

rows.label: qst500801_msg0010
rows.name:
It happen on day of bright blue sky,
look like perfect salvage weather.

rows.label: qst500801_msg0011
rows.name:
Suddenly dark clouds cover blue sky.
Then mist cover ground, hail fall down
and even snow pile up.

rows.label: qst500801_msg0012
rows.name:
Ever since that day, nobody see
Noporikh again.

rows.label: qst500801_msg0013
rows.name:
Some say Noporikh try to
return home but get gobbled
up by Gluttonous Marrin.

rows.label: qst500801_msg0014
rows.name:
What me trying to say is, even most
amazing salvager have bad day.
So never let guard down!

rows.label: qst500801_msg0015
rows.name:
I even hear people see Gluttonous
Marrin around Chansagh Wastes in Superbia lately, so friends be careful!
